phrases.text: Hey, how’s it going?
Not much, you?
What’s new with you?
I’m good, thanks for asking!
Oh man, I’m so tired today.
You won’t believe what happened!
Need a hand with that?
Want to grab a coffee later?
What’s for lunch?
Catch you later!
Sounds good to me!
Do you have a minute?
Let me know what you think.
That’s awesome!
No worries, take your time.
I hear you.
Oh, for sure!
What’s on your mind?
Have you seen this yet?
Let me grab that for you.
What time works for you?
That’s totally fine with me.
I’m heading out, need anything?
Oh wow, really?
You’ve got to be kidding me!
I’ll be right back.
Can you believe this weather?
Thanks, I appreciate it.
Any plans this weekend?
Let me think about that for a sec.
I’ll take care of it.
Can I get back to you on that?
I’m not sure, to be honest.
Let’s catch up soon!
What did you think of that?
Do you mind if I join you?
Hey, long time no see!
Sorry, I didn’t catch that.
All good, no problem.
That’s so annoying!
How did it go?
Let’s do it!
Oh, I love that!
No way, that’s so cool!
I can’t wait!
What do you think about this?
I’m just going to chill today.
Take care, see you soon.
That’s a good question.
What’s the plan?
Don’t worry about it.
It’s up to you.
It’s been a long day.
I’m so glad to see you!
Let’s meet halfway.
Good luck with that!
You’ve got this!
It’s all good!
Anything else I can do?
What are you up to?
Let’s make it happen.
How’s your family doing?
I’m all ears.
Let’s keep in touch.
That’s so funny!
I had no idea!
What’s going on?
It’s kind of a big deal.
I’m really looking forward to it.
How do you feel about that?
I totally agree.
Want me to handle that for you?
Do you have time for a quick chat?
It’s been forever since we last talked!
That’s insane!
Can you believe it?
Are you sure?
I’ve got your back.
I’m just messing with you.
It is what it is.
Fingers crossed!
What do you mean?
That’s what I was thinking.
What a day!
Let me know if you need anything else.
Do you need a ride?
Is that okay with you?
Oh, that’s such a bummer.
I’ll catch you later!
I can’t believe that happened.
Thanks for letting me know.
I didn’t expect that!
I’d love to hear more about it.
How’s your day been?
I was just thinking about you!
I’m running a bit late.
Let’s play it by ear.
That’s the last thing I needed today.
I’ll take your word for it.
Let me check on that.
I think we’re on the same page.
I’m so sorry to hear that.
It’s been one of those days.
That’s the way to go!
Do you have any recommendations?
What a coincidence!
I can’t make it, sorry.
That’s a solid plan.
You’ve got to try it!
I really appreciate that.
Thanks, that means a lot.
That’s exactly what I needed.
It’s all coming together now.
How do you know that person?
I had a great time!
I’ll see what I can do.
What’s your take on this?
I couldn’t agree more.
Where were we?
Just checking in.
It’s nice to have a break.
Let’s make it happen!
It’s been on my mind all day.
That’s good to know!
I owe you one.
I’m so glad we did this!
I’m totally with you.
That came out of nowhere!
I can’t get over it.
That’s a bit much, don’t you think?
Do you need a hand with that?
I’ve been meaning to tell you.
Oh, you didn’t have to do that!
I appreciate the heads up.
I’ll keep that in mind.
Let’s not overthink it.
I’m so glad you brought that up.
It’s been a minute!
I’m right there with you.
That’s my favorite!
That’s a tough one.
I’ll get on that right away.
You’re not wrong!
Oh, no worries at all.
That’s what friends are for.
Keep me posted!
You’re the best!
I’m just going with the flow.
No way, that’s wild!
I can’t help but laugh!
That’s a game-changer!
You know me too well.
I’m in if you’re in.
What are you thinking about?
Can you spot me?
That’s a bit off, don’t you think?
I’m not feeling it today.
Thanks for having my back.
I’m good either way.
What’s the worst that could happen?
Let’s not stress about it.
Let’s circle back to this.
What’s the vibe today?
I’d rather not, if that’s okay.
What’s your schedule looking like?
It’s going to be great, trust me.
I’m all set, thanks.
That’s exactly what I was thinking!
You’re spot on with that.
I can roll with that.
I’m totally over it.
Let’s see where this goes.
I’m here for it.
Hey, how’s it going? I’ve been meaning to ask you about that trip you mentioned last time. Did you end up going?
Not much is new with me. I’ve just been trying to catch up on some work. How about you? Anything exciting happening?
I’m good, just a little tired from staying up late last night. I was watching this show that I just couldn’t stop binging. Have you seen it?
Oh wow, I can’t believe that happened! That must have been such a stressful situation. How did you handle it?
You’ve got to tell me more about that! I feel like I’m missing part of the story, and it sounds so interesting.
Let me grab that for you. It looks heavy, and I don’t mind helping out. Where do you need it?
Hey, want to grab lunch later? I was thinking about trying that new Italian place down the street. It looks amazing!
I just realized I forgot my umbrella, and it looks like it’s about to pour. Do you think you could give me a lift home?
Catch you later! Let me know if you decide on the time for this weekend. I want to make sure I don’t double-book.
Sounds good to me! Just let me know what you need from my side, and I’ll take care of it. This should be fun!
Do you have a minute? I wanted to run something by you and get your take on it. It’s not urgent, just something I’ve been thinking about.
That’s awesome! I can’t believe you managed to pull that off. Seriously, great job!
No worries, take your time. I’ll be here when you’re ready. No rush at all.
I hear you. It’s definitely frustrating when things don’t go as planned, but you handled it really well.
Oh, for sure! I think it’s a great idea, and I can totally see why you’re excited about it.
What’s on your mind? You seem a little quiet today. Is everything okay?
Have you seen this yet? I found it online yesterday, and I immediately thought of you. It’s totally your style!
Let me grab that for you. You’ve already done so much; it’s the least I can do.
What time works for you? I’m pretty flexible, so just let me know, and I’ll make it happen.
That’s totally fine with me. Honestly, whatever works best for you is fine. I’m just happy to help.
I’m heading out, need anything? I’m going to the store, so if there’s something you’re out of, just let me know.
Oh wow, really? That’s such great news! I’m so happy for you.
You’ve got to be kidding me! That’s just too crazy to be true. Are you sure that’s how it went down?
I’ll be right back. I just need to grab my jacket from the car, and then we’re good to go.
Can you believe this weather? It’s supposed to be spring, but it feels like winter won’t let go.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I honestly don’t know what I would’ve done without your help.
Any plans this weekend? I was thinking about doing something outdoors if the weather holds up. What about you?
Let me think about that for a sec. I want to make sure I give you the best advice I can.
I’ll take care of it. You’ve got enough on your plate already, so let me handle this one.
Can I get back to you on that? I just need a little more time to figure things out.
I’m not sure, to be honest. It’s one of those things that could go either way.
Let’s catch up soon! It feels like it’s been forever since we really talked.
What did you think of that? I was on the edge of my seat the entire time.
Do you mind if I join you? I could use some company right now, and you’re always fun to hang out with.
Hey, long time no see! How have you been? You’ve got to fill me in on everything.
Sorry, I didn’t catch that. Could you repeat it? I want to make sure I understood you.
All good, no problem. These things happen, and it’s not a big deal at all.
That’s so annoying! I can’t believe they would do something like that. How are you dealing with it?
How did it go? I was thinking about you and wondering how it turned out.
Let’s do it! I’m all in if you are. This is going to be so much fun.
Oh, I love that! It’s exactly what I was hoping for. Great choice!
No way, that’s so cool! You have to tell me more about how you made that happen.
I can’t wait! I’ve been looking forward to this all week. It’s going to be amazing.
What do you think about this? I feel like it could work, but I’d love to hear your perspective.
I’m just going to chill today. It’s been a hectic week, and I need a break to recharge.
Take care, see you soon. Let me know if there’s anything I can do for you in the meantime.
That’s a good question. I’m not entirely sure, but I can look into it for you.
What’s the plan? I’m happy to go along with whatever you think is best.
Don’t worry about it. It’s really not a big deal, and I’m happy to help.
It’s up to you. Whatever you decide, I’m sure it’ll be great.
It’s been a long day. I’m so ready to just kick back and relax for a bit.
I’m so glad to see you! It’s been way too long since we hung out like this.
Let’s meet halfway. That way, it’s convenient for both of us, and we can catch up properly.
Good luck with that! I know you’ve been working hard on it, and I’m sure it’ll turn out great.
You’ve got this! I believe in you, and I know you’re going to nail it.
It’s all good! Honestly, don’t stress about it. Everything will work out in the end.
Anything else I can do? I want to make sure you have everything you need before I go.
What are you up to? It’s been a quiet day on my end, but I’m curious what you’ve been doing.
Let’s make it happen. We’ve talked about it long enough; it’s time to take action.
Hey, how’s your morning going? I was just thinking about that event you mentioned—are you still planning to go?
Not much going on here, just trying to get through my to-do list. How about you? Anything fun planned for today?
I’m feeling pretty good, just a little swamped with work. Have you had a chance to relax recently?
That sounds amazing! You’ll have to send me some pictures when you’re there—it sounds like such a cool experience.
You wouldn’t believe what I just heard! It’s so wild, and I thought of you immediately because I know you’d appreciate it.
Let me help you with that. It looks like a two-person job, and I don’t mind stepping in.
Want to grab a bite to eat later? I was thinking we could try that new sushi place downtown.
I can’t wait to tell you all about it. It was such a whirlwind of events, and I know you’ll get a kick out of it.
Catch you later! Don’t forget to text me when you’re free so we can figure out plans for next week.
Sounds like a plan! Let’s stick to it, and if anything changes, we’ll adjust as needed.
Do you have a second? I’ve been wanting to pick your brain about something, and your advice would mean a lot to me.
That’s fantastic! I’m so glad things are working out for you. You’ve put in so much effort, and it shows.
No worries at all. Life gets busy sometimes, and I completely understand. Let’s touch base when you have a moment.
I get what you mean. It’s frustrating when things don’t align perfectly, but I think you’re handling it really well.
Oh, for sure! I think that’s the best way to go about it. It’s practical and makes a lot of sense.
What’s been on your mind lately? I feel like we haven’t had a good catch-up in a while, and I’d love to hear about everything.
Have you checked out that new series everyone’s talking about? I binged it last weekend, and it’s honestly worth the hype.
Let me carry this for you—it looks like you’ve got your hands full. Where are we heading with it?
What time works best for you? I can shift a few things around to make sure it fits into both of our schedules.
That’s totally okay with me. Whatever makes things easier for you works for me too.
I’m heading out in a bit. Do you need me to grab anything for you while I’m running errands?
Oh wow, that’s incredible! I knew you’d do well, but this is even better than I expected.
You’ve got to hear this! It’s one of the most ridiculous things I’ve ever come across, and I think you’ll find it hilarious.
I’ll be right back—just need to grab something real quick, and then I’m all yours.
Can you believe this heat? It feels like we skipped spring entirely and jumped straight into summer.
Thanks for helping out. I honestly don’t know how I would have managed this without you stepping in.
Got any fun plans this weekend? I’m debating whether to do something active or just lounge around.
Give me a second to process that—it’s such a great idea, and I want to make sure I give it some real thought.
I’ll handle it for you. You’ve been juggling a lot, and I can take this off your plate.
Do you mind if I get back to you later? I need to check a couple of things before I can commit.
I’m honestly not sure yet, but I think it’ll all work out one way or another.
Let’s definitely catch up soon! It feels like we’ve both been so busy, and I miss our conversations.
What’s your take on that? I’ve been going back and forth, and I’d really value your opinion.
Can I join you for a bit? I’ve been meaning to talk to you about something, and now seems like a good time.
Hey, it’s been forever! How have you been? You look like you’ve got some good news to share.
Sorry, I missed that last part. Could you say it again? I want to make sure I didn’t misunderstand.
It’s all good. We’ll figure it out as we go, and I’m sure it’ll turn out fine.
That’s frustrating, no doubt. But I think you’re handling it better than most people would.
How did everything pan out? I’ve been curious to know how it all played out in the end.
Let’s go for it! I’m totally on board, and I think it’ll be worth the effort.
That’s exactly the kind of thing I love! Thanks for recommending it—I’ll check it out for sure.
No way, that’s amazing! You’ve got to tell me how it all came together like that.
I’m counting down the days! This is going to be such a highlight for me, and I’m glad we’re doing it together.
What do you think of this idea? It might be a bit out there, but I think it could really work.
I think today’s just going to be a lazy day for me. Sometimes you just need to recharge, you know?
Take it easy, and let me know if there’s anything I can help you with while you’re working through it.
That’s a tough one, but I think you’re on the right track. It’s all about finding a balance.
What’s the game plan? I’m ready to dive in as soon as you give me the green light.
It’s all good. I’ve got your back, and we’ll tackle this one step at a time.
It’s completely up to you. Whatever you think is best, I’ll fully support it.
It’s been a crazy day on my end, but I’m so glad we’re finally catching up.
It’s great to see you again! It feels like it’s been way too long since we’ve had a proper catch-up session.
Let’s split the difference and find a middle ground that works for everyone involved.
Good luck with everything! I’ll be cheering you on from the sidelines and sending good vibes your way.
You’ve got this! I know it feels overwhelming, but you’re more capable than you realize.
It’s no big deal, really. I’m happy to help out, and I know you’d do the same for me.
Is there anything else I can do before I head out? Just let me know, and I’ll take care of it.
What’s been keeping you busy these days? I feel like you’ve always got something interesting going on.
Let’s finally make this happen. We’ve been talking about it forever, and there’s no time like the present.
I was thinking we could meet up after work sometime this week. Let me know what your schedule looks like.
That’s such a great idea! I can’t believe we haven’t thought of it sooner—it’s going to be perfect.
Oh man, you’re not going to believe what happened to me today. It’s one of those stories that just gets crazier as it goes on.
Let me know if you need a hand with that—I’d be happy to help out if I can.
How’s everything going on your end? I feel like it’s been a while since we caught up properly.
Thanks for being so patient. I know it’s been a process, but I think we’re finally making progress.
I love that idea! It’s creative, and it has a lot of potential to really stand out.
If you’re up for it, I’d love to hear more about your plans. It sounds like you’ve got something exciting in the works.
Sorry to interrupt, but I just had to share this—it’s such a crazy coincidence!
Let’s not overthink it. Sometimes, the simplest option is the best way to go.
You’re doing an amazing job. Don’t let the little setbacks get to you—they’re all part of the process.
Can you remind me what time we’re meeting later? I just want to make sure I don’t miss it.
You know, it’s been a long time since we did something spontaneous. How about we plan an impromptu adventure this weekend?
That’s such a thoughtful gesture. You always know how to make people feel appreciated.
I really enjoyed catching up with you today. Let’s not wait so long before the next time!
You’ve got a knack for this kind of thing. It’s like everything you touch turns out perfectly.
I think we’re on the same page here. Let’s move forward and see how it plays out.
I’ve been meaning to ask—how did that big project of yours turn out? I’ve been so curious about it.
That’s so exciting! You must be thrilled about how everything is coming together so well.
Do you think we should bring anything else for the gathering? I don’t want to show up empty-handed.
I’m honestly so impressed with how you handled that. It’s not an easy situation, but you made it look effortless.
I’ve got some free time this afternoon. If you need help with anything, just let me know.
That’s such a cool perspective! I hadn’t thought of it like that before, but it makes so much sense now.
Let’s aim to finish this by the end of the week. I think we’ll feel great once it’s out of the way.
I love that you’re always thinking outside the box. It’s such a great quality to have.
Have you ever thought about taking a break and just doing something completely different for a while? It might be refreshing.
That’s such a good call. I feel like it’s exactly what we need to get back on track.
Let’s make it a point to celebrate this. It’s a big deal, and you deserve to be recognized for it.
I think you’re absolutely right about that. It’s the kind of approach that makes everything run smoother.
I’ve been reflecting on what we talked about the other day, and I think you gave me some really solid advice.
That’s a lot to take in, but I think you’re handling it as well as anyone could. You’ve got this!
Let’s circle back to this later. I think we need some time to process before making a decision.
You’re such a great listener. I really appreciate that about you—it’s such a rare quality these days.
Can you believe how quickly the week has flown by? It feels like just yesterday it was Monday.
I’ve got an idea I’d love to run by you. It’s still in the early stages, but I think it could really work.
That’s exactly what I was hoping to hear. It’s reassuring to know we’re on the same page.
Thanks for being there for me. It’s times like these that I realize how lucky I am to have you in my life.
What’s the latest on that? I feel like I’m out of the loop and need to catch up.
That’s such great news! You’ve worked so hard for this, and it’s awesome to see it pay off.
I was thinking about what you said the other day, and it really stuck with me. You always have such great insights.
Want to do something low-key this weekend? I’m feeling like a chill day might be just what we need.
It’s been a rough couple of days, but I think things are finally starting to look up.
I love how passionate you are about this. It’s inspiring to see someone so invested in what they care about.
Let’s take a step back and reevaluate. Sometimes, a fresh perspective can make all the difference.
You’re such a natural at this! It’s like you’ve been doing it your whole life.
I’m so glad you brought that up. It’s something I’ve been meaning to discuss, but I wasn’t sure how to approach it.
What’s your go-to comfort food? I feel like I need something to pick me up today.
I think you handled that so well. It’s not easy to keep your cool in a situation like that.
I can’t wait to see how this turns out. It feels like we’re on the verge of something really exciting.
You’ve got such a great energy about you today! It’s infectious in the best way possible.
That’s a fantastic idea! Let’s make it happen—I think it’ll be a big hit.
I really admire how you always put in 100%. It’s so inspiring to see someone so dedicated.
Let’s take a break and grab some coffee. I feel like we could both use a little pick-me-up.
Do you want to brainstorm some ideas together? I think we’d come up with something great as a team.
I really appreciate how you’re always so supportive. It means a lot to me, especially during tough times.
That’s such a bold move, but I think it’s exactly what’s needed to make a real difference.
I was just thinking about that trip we took last year. We should plan something similar soon—it was so much fun!
It’s so refreshing to talk to someone who genuinely listens and cares about what you have to say.
I’m all ears if you need to vent. Sometimes it helps just to get it all out, you know?
Have you noticed how amazing the sunsets have been lately? It’s like nature’s putting on a show for us.
That’s such a great choice! It’s classic, but it never goes out of style. I think you’ll love it.
I feel like we’ve got some really good momentum going. Let’s keep it up and see where it takes us.
What’s your favorite way to unwind after a long day? I’m always looking for new ideas to relax.
Thanks for always being so reliable. It’s great to have someone I can count on no matter what.
Let’s make it a point to do this more often. I always feel so much better after catching up with you.
That’s such an exciting opportunity! I can’t wait to see where it takes you—you totally deserve it.
I was thinking we could try something new this weekend. Maybe a cooking class or a hike—what do you think?
Do you ever just stop and think about how far you’ve come? You’ve accomplished so much, and it’s inspiring.
Let’s not overcomplicate things. Sometimes, the simplest solutions are the most effective.
That’s such a thoughtful way to approach it. I think it’s going to make a big difference in the long run.
You’ve got such a great sense of humor. It’s one of the things I appreciate most about hanging out with you.
What’s your favorite memory from this year so far? I’d love to hear about what’s stood out to you.
I’m so proud of you for taking that step. It’s not easy, but I think it’s going to pay off big time.

Let’s not rush into anything. Sometimes, taking a little extra time can make all the difference.
Do you have any good recommendations for books or movies? I’m in the mood for something new.

Let’s set some goals for this week. I think it’ll help us stay focused and motivated.
I’m really looking forward to this! It’s going to be so nice to just relax and enjoy some time together.
It’s so impressive how you’re able to stay calm under pressure. It’s a quality I really admire about you.
